main_definition: Through refers to movement from one side or end of something to the other, completion of a process, understanding or experiencing something thoroughly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of physical space and direction
To finish or complete a process or task
meanings_and_examples.example: He worked hard to go through all his tasks before leaving for vacation.
After reading the book, she finally understood its message and went through her own emotions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a way that affects every part of
meanings_and_examples.example: The new policy affected everyone in the company equally, going through all departments.
